concept.title: Introduction: Polaris Integrations
concept.shortdesc: Polaris Integrations can trigger Polaris from your repository or interoperate with other third-party tools like Jira to streamline your workflows.

section.p: Here are some ways to use repository integrations:

ul.li: Run tests when code is checked into your default branch on GitHub or GitLab.
Create a GitHub pull request comment when an issue is found or resolved.
Fail the build in your CI system when a high-severity issue is found.

section.p: Here's what you can do with the Jira integration:

ul.li: Connect Polaris with the Jira instance that your organization already uses.
Select a Jira project and issue type for any issues exported from your Polaris project.
Create a Jira issue when Polaris finds a relevant new issue in a test.
